wordpressPage.title: If you were a…
wordpressPage.content:
This is a simple game that is easily adaptable.

Ask each young person to think about an item they could be, i.e. ‘If you were a vegetable what would you be and why?’

Once everyone has thought about their vegetable go around the group each sharing your vegetable with each other

(You can change vegetable to whatever you like!)
